last_episode_to_air.name: Welcome to NY, New Jersey!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Camilla fights for her life as all of her actions as Supervillain come back to haunt her; New York and Teresa have an explosive fight; the villains have a slumber party.

name: House of Villains

next_episode_to_air.name: Blood Bath
next_episode_to_air.overview: A new Supervillain is crowned; Wes tells Kandy a big secret that changes the game; Teresa feels conflicted when she's torn between two villains.

overview: Villains from some of television's most popular reality shows will be put in competition, where each week one will be eliminated until only one winner remains.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Ten infamous reality TV villains are brought together under one roof, competing in a series of intense challenges for a grand prize and the ultimate title of the most notorious villain. Tensions rise as alliances form, betrayals unfold, and iconic personalities clash, making every episode a battle of strategy, manipulation, and survival in the world of villainy.

episodes.name: Welcome to the House of Villains
episodes.overview: The villains move into their new lair and start sizing up their competition. Omarosa proves to be the HBIC as she immediately targets who she believes to be the weakest link. Alliances form as each villain strategizes their way to the $200,000 cash prize. After a battle royale and some manipulation, one villain becomes the supervillain of the week and chooses the fate of three castmates by putting them up for elimination.

episodes.name: The Lesser of Three Evils
episodes.overview: Corinne, Jax and Shake compete in the first redemption challenge; one villain questions whether or not they've been sabotaged by a supposed ally; one of the hit list nominees becomes the first villain voted out of the house.

episodes.name: Secret Identities
episodes.overview: After the first contestant is eliminated, a surprise guest visits; the remaining villains must compete in a masquerade ball challenge where limited clues and extreme costumes help them guess their castmates' identities.

episodes.name: Dance With the Devil
episodes.overview: The Villains are visited by another surprise guest; the hit list nominees must convince the others to unknowingly participate in their redemption challenge; Bobby is insulted after being put up on the hit list; New York continues to spiral.

episodes.name: Shake Showdown
episodes.overview: Anfisa investigates who voted to eliminate her; Shake scrambles to get the spotlight off of him; Bobby questions his alliance with Corinne; the villains compete in an ice challenge where the Super Villain of the Week will be determined.

episodes.name: The Gospel Truth
episodes.overview: Omarosa blows up her newest alliance as the villains head out for a disastrous group outing; a surprise guest visits the house and serves Shake with yet another unexpected stroke of luck; Tanisha gives the rest of the house a timely wake-up call.

episodes.name: Pride Cometh Before The Fall
episodes.overview: Omarosa is infuriated by the result of the house vote; Jonny Fairplay gets the entire house on board with his strategy for the Battle Royale; the newly minted supervillain puts up the most shocking hit list yet.

episodes.name: Three Villains Walk Into A Bar...Ouch
episodes.overview: Bobby's supervillain era continues as the house reels in the aftermath of his hit list; the villains venture out to a comedy club for a redemption challenge; Jonny Fairplay finds himself on the wrong side of the Space Fam.

episodes.name: One Less Rat In This House To Deal With
episodes.overview: Joel presents the villains with their most important Battle Royale yet; Omarosa proceeds to blow it; Anfisa reconsiders her loyalties as Bananas makes good on his promise to Jonny Fairplay; Shake finds himself in a surprising position of power.

episodes.name: Heavy Is the Head That Wears the Crown
episodes.overview: The final five villains are joined by special guests for their last meal; Shake faces down his biggest competition of the season; Bananas finds himself torn between his two biggest allies; a winner claims the title of America's Ultimate Supervillain.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Ten infamous reality TV villains are brought together under one roof, competing in a series of intense challenges for a grand prize and the ultimate title of the most notorious villain. Tensions rise as alliances form, betrayals unfold, and iconic personalities clash, making every episode a battle of strategy, manipulation, and survival in the world of villainy.

episodes.name: Crimes Against Reality (Television)
episodes.overview: Ten new reality TV villains compete for the title of America's Ultimate Supervillain and a $200,000 cash prize; they forge alliances; the first battle royale gives a villain immunity, and the first three villains are nominated for elimination.

episodes.name: The Hollywood Walk of Shame
episodes.overview: The Hit List nominees compete in the season's first Redemption Challenge; New York begins having psychic visions, giving her clarity on who will win the challenge; one villain manages to annoy the rest.

episodes.name: Don't Disrupt the Pecking Order
episodes.overview: Joel introduces the most villainous plot twist yet, which gives one lucky villain a secret advantage; the remaining villains dance it off in a disco themed Battle Royale, where alliances are revealed, and a new Supervillain is crowned.

episodes.name: High Voltage Villains
episodes.overview: The hit list nominees must rely on their fellow villains to guide them through their blind Redemption Challenge; a familiar face from season 1 visits the house; Camilla continues to alienate her allies, as the villains head into banishment.

episodes.name: Housewife v. Housewife
episodes.overview: A friendship is put to the test as two villains campaign to become Supervillain; New York shakes things up with her roommate; Wes becomes an official Housewife; someone's past comes back to haunt them.

episodes.name: Welcome to NY, New Jersey!
episodes.overview: Camilla fights for her life as all of her actions as Supervillain come back to haunt her; New York and Teresa have an explosive fight; the villains have a slumber party.

episodes.name: Blood Bath
episodes.overview: A new Supervillain is crowned; Wes tells Kandy a big secret that changes the game; Teresa feels conflicted when she's torn between two villains.
